name: @energyweb/onchain-claims
description: This package provides code to enable on-chain credential/roles

scripts.build: npm run compile:contracts && npm run build:typechain && npm run compile:ts && copyfiles build/contracts/**/*.json -u 1 dist && copyfiles "ethers/**/*.d.ts" dist && copyfiles "contracts/**/*" -u 1 dist/contracts
scripts.build:typechain: npm run build:typechain:claimmanager && npm run build:typechain:claimsrevocationregistry
scripts.compile: npm run compile:contracts && npm run build
scripts.ganache: ganache-cli -m "candy maple cake sugar pudding cream honey rich smooth crumble sweet treat" --port 8544 --accounts 20 --networkId=9 --chainId 73799 --gasLimit=10000000
scripts.test:truffle: run-with-testrpc -m "candy maple cake sugar pudding cream honey rich smooth crumble sweet treat" --port 8544 --accounts 20 --networkId=9 --gasLimit=10000000 "npm run truffle-tests"
scripts.truffle: rm -rf build/contracts && ts-node test/truffle/upgradedContract.ts && truffle test test/truffle/claimManager.upgrade.test.ts && rm -rf contracts/roles/ClaimManagerUpgradeTest.sol
scripts.test-rpc: run-with-testrpc -m "candy maple cake sugar pudding cream honey rich smooth crumble sweet treat" --port 8544 --accounts 20 --networkId=9 --chainId 73799 --gasLimit=10000000 "npm run test-ganache"
